channel.title: Hack DragonFable
channel.description:
Hello, i got told how to use Ce on DF for xp and i kinda figures sum more out myself :P enjoy
Edit: allso uploading a video on how to do the XP hack, my friend didnt understand me -.-
Requirements: http://cheatengine.org/download.php
and flash 8+ Neutral
oh yeh and half a brain Razz
Step 1, download and install the link above, cheat engine. step 2 login to dragon fable and start any quest. now we start:
first we will do the money hack Razz my fave Load your CE and select firefor(or)explorer.exe
Step 1. start and quest and kill a small group of monsters and then click the quest tab, then number shown for gold should be times by 8 then be shearched on CE
*images, save space Razz* http://img253.imageshack.us/my.php?image=05242007232701wl4.png http://img413.imageshack.us/my.php?image=05242007233221nc6.png
step2 kill another monster and do step 1 again
step 3, if u still dont have 1 - 2 numbers then do it again untill u reach 1-2 numbers
step4, the numbers u are left with sould be moved the address list and the velus times by the number !8! only or it will crash, once u are happy with the value u need to freeze it (check the box ), now close the quest tab and re open it.
http://img257.imageshack.us/my.php?image=05242007234145ya7.png Edit the value, like this Razz
should have a result like this, *(sorry is this is typed sloppy, ill tidy it up :p ) http://img502.imageshack.us/my.php?image=05242007234303zz1.png
**posting xp hack next**
Ok now the xp hack :eek:
step 1: start an event or a quest dosent matter wich 1 aslong as it has a few monsters to kill
step 2: searth your total xp amout, start from 0
step 3: kill a monster, no look at your xp again and whatever number it shows this time u MUST times it by !8! then search that.
step4: do step 3 again untill u get donw to only 1 address.
step5: the adress u are left with should be put into your address list and the values times b8 a few time.
step6: once u are happy with the value u need to freeze it ( check the little box ) and then close and reopen the quest tab.
step7: FINISHED THE QUEST :O!
**next HP and Mana Hack**
**Health Hack**
step1. Log on to the desired character.
step2. Take note of your current health.
step3. Multiply it by 8, then scan for it in CE using the 4-byte option.
step4. Go fight and monster untill it damages you.
step5. Take note of your new health.
step6. Multiply it by 8, and scan in CE using the 4-byte option.
step7. You should have 1 address in the list now. Freeze it.
step step8. Optional; change your health to a high value, make sure its a multiple of 8000, or your brower might freeze, though that is unlikely.
**Mana Hack**
stepstep1. Log on to the desired character.
step2. Take note of your current mana. 3. Multiply it by 8, then scan for it in CE using the 4-byte option.
step4. Go fight and monster untill you lose mana via casting spell/ability.
step5. Take note of your new mana.
step6. Multiply it by 8, and scan in CE using the 4-byte option. 7. You should have 1 address in the list now. Freeze it.
step8. Optional; change your mana to a high value, make sure its a multiple of 8000, or your brower might freeze, though that is unlikely.
**next critical hit hack**
.... needs typeing lol be back with it soon :D

item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Unid H4x0r:

L33c3d It off the other Tut: [PICS] Hack DragonFable

Nope. It’s not word for word. And I don’t think you can actually “leech” a tip or trick…

And plus, the other tut never got updated with more hacks.

item.title: Hack DragonFable
item.dc:creator: @the_noob the noob
item.description:
@the_noob wrote:

This isnt actually hacking dragonfable, although it is still good. This is just editing the hex values of the game. Hacking would be like going into the servers and editing the programming in the game and actually hacking levels. A hack i wanna see for this game is getting to equipt armor without a dragon medallion! nice hex editing though.

Read full topic

item.title: Hack DragonFable
item.dc:creator: @hellboy4863 hellboy4863
item.description:
@hellboy4863 wrote:

No it wasn’t
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 25, 2007, 06:26:56 PM[/size][hr]I can do it[br][size=1]Posted on: May 25, 2007, 06:27:53 PM[/size][hr]when i did the money cheat i set it for 50,000 and it seemed to work, but it only gave me 2000 for some reason. oh well
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2007, 09:38:38 PM[/size][hr]Just for people who don’t understand the XP cheat, it’s exactly like the money cheat, just changing the XP instead of money.

item.title: Hack DragonFable
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

Hello, i got told how to use Ce on DF for xp and i kinda figures sum more out myself enjoy

Edit: allso uploading a video on how to do the XP hack, my friend didnt understand me -.-

Requirements:
http://cheatengine.org/download.php

and flash 8+ Neutral

oh yeh and half a brain Razz

Step 1, download and install the link above, cheat engine.
step 2 login to dragon fable and start any quest.
now we start:

first we will do the money hack Razz my fave
Load your CE and select firefor(or)explorer.exe

Step 1.
start and quest and kill a small group of monsters and then click the quest tab, then number shown for gold should be times by 8 then be shearched on CE

images, save space Razz
http://img253.imageshack.us/my.php?image=05242007232701wl4.png
http://img413.imageshack.us/my.php?image=05242007233221nc6.png

step2 kill another monster and do step 1 again

step 3, if u still dont have 1 - 2 numbers then do it again untill u reach 1-2 numbers

step4, the numbers u are left with sould be
moved the address list and the velus times by the number !8! only or it will crash, once u are happy with the value u need to freeze it (check the box ), now close the quest tab and re open it.

http://img257.imageshack.us/my.php?image=05242007234145ya7.png
Edit the value, like this Razz

should have a result like this, *(sorry is this is typed sloppy, ill tidy it up )
http://img502.imageshack.us/my.php?image=05242007234303zz1.png

posting xp hack next

Ok now the xp hack :eek:

step 1: start an event or a quest dosent matter wich 1 aslong as it has a few monsters to kill

step 2: searth your total xp amout, start from 0

step 3: kill a monster, no look at your xp again and whatever number it shows this time u MUST times it by !8! then search that.

step4: do step 3 again untill u get donw to only 1 address.

step5: the adress u are left with should be put into your address list and the values times b8 a few time.

step6: once u are happy with the value u need to freeze it ( check the little box ) and then close and reopen the quest tab.

step7: FINISHED THE QUEST :O!

next HP and Mana Hack

Health Hack

step1. Log on to the desired character.

step2. Take note of your current health.

step3. Multiply it by 8, then scan for it in CE using the 4-byte option.

step4. Go fight and monster untill it damages you.

step5. Take note of your new health.

step6. Multiply it by 8, and scan in CE using the 4-byte option.

step7. You should have 1 address in the list now. Freeze it.

step
step8. Optional; change your health to a high value, make sure its a multiple of 8000, or your brower might freeze, though that is unlikely.

Mana Hack

stepstep1. Log on to the desired character.

step2. Take note of your current mana.
3. Multiply it by 8, then scan for it in CE using the 4-byte option.

step4. Go fight and monster untill you lose mana via casting spell/ability.

step5. Take note of your new mana.

step6. Multiply it by 8, and scan in CE using the 4-byte option.
7. You should have 1 address in the list now. Freeze it.

step8. Optional; change your mana to a high value, make sure its a multiple of 8000, or your brower might freeze, though that is unlikely.
